Implementation of the Super paramagnetic clustering

* Free software: BSD license

Installation
============

::

    pip install spm

Documentation
=============

https://spmcluster.readthedocs.org/

Development
===========

To run the all tests run::

    tox


Changelog
=========

0.1.0 (2015-10-07)
-----------------------------------------

* First release on PyPI.
